name: Neko - The Black Cat
description:
Neko is alone. 
His owners have vanished!
Where have they gone?
Did they abandon him?
Does he even care?

Download & print your cute mini-zine!
Or you can also run it in browser above.
Printing is cooler but I don't judge you! :)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pick-your-path mini-zine made for A-Game-By-Its-Cover #AGBIC
September 2020
Based on the fantastic famicase design by Richard Lawton:

Made using Gimp and the incredible Electric Zine Maker by Nathalie Lawhead (alienmelon).

This zine has been created using resources from freepik.com and freepatternarea.com.
